price: 42. Marka Maalintaa (Qiyaame) uma hana- nayo midkiinna midka kale dheef iyo dhib midna,waxaana ku odhan kuwaasi dulmiga (shirkiga iyo macaasida) falay: Dhadhami- ya Cadaabka Naarta aad beeninayseen.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يَمۡلِكُ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ نَّفۡعٗا وَلَا ضَرّٗا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma lā yamliku baʿḍukum libaʿḍin nafʿan walā ḍarran wanaqūlu lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāba al-nāri allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
